tasks.label: Run with IO Redirect and Compare
args:
cd "${fileDirname}" && /opt/homebrew/bin/g++-14 -std=c++17 -O2 -Wall -D OFFLINE_JUDGE "${file}" -o "${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out" && ./"${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out" < "${fileBasenameNoExtension}_input.txt" > "${fileBasenameNoExtension}_output.txt" && echo "
üìã Comparing output...
" && if diff -q -b  "${fileBasenameNoExtension}_output.txt" "${fileBasenameNoExtension}_expected_output.txt"; then echo "
‚úÖ Output matches expected output."; else echo "
‚ùå Output differs! See diff below:
" && diff -b  "${fileBasenameNoExtension}_output.txt" "${fileBasenameNoExtension}_expected_output.txt"; fi
